news.title: Introducing the New HiFocus™ SlimJ Electrode and Announcing the Success of the First Surgeries - Press Release
news.summary: VALENCIA, Calif.--(Business Wire)-- Advanced Bionics (AB) announces TÜV approval of the HiFocus™ SlimJ electrode.

news.title: Introducing the New HiFocus™ SlimJ Electrode and Announcing the Success of the First Surgeries
news.summary: Advanced Bionics (AB) announces TÜV approval of the HiFocus™ SlimJ electrode. Built on the proven HiFocus™ platform and developed with numerous surgeons from around the globe, the new SlimJ electrode features a thin, straight design for easy…
